steps.text: In a medium mixing bowl, use a hand mixer on low speed to combine the milk and granulated sugar until the sugar is dissolved
Stir in the heavy cream and vanilla
Turn on the ice cream machine and pour in the cream mixture
Let the cream mixture mix until thickened, about 20-25 minutes
When the mixture is about 2-3 from finished, add the Amaretto (if you add it before the ice cream is mostly frozen it will hinder the freezing process)
The ice cream will have a soft, creamy texture when finished. If a firmer consistency is desired, transfer the ice cream to an airtight container and place in a freezer for about 2 hours
Remove from freezer about 15 minutes before serving
